item.title: Feedbackkk on this simplee layoutt? :)
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

Well, they’re not very good, but I haven’t been doing alot of actual web design, and I’m bored of graphic design, so

I’ve only got this one to show you so far; it’s not very well layed out, but you can use it if you like.
It’s a plain CSS/text layout, useful for a text onlyy blog or something. Or, if you’re new to HTML & CSS, scan through the source, and try to understand what does what, and maybe clean up the script, fix a few errors That helped me when I was learning!

It doesn’t look as nice in firefox, so look at it IE!

Cannn anybody spot my (deliberate) mistake?

It’s easyy on firefox ahaha.

[code]

OPENclose by JV

OPENclose
open : close : open : close : open

Open_______________________
